#!/bin/bash

sleep 1
minWindow() {
    xdotool getactivewindow windowminimize
}
cd /path/to/zeronet

if [ $1 ]; then
    if [ $1 == "disable" ]; then
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor $1
    elif [ $1 == "no-git" ]; then
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor always
    else
    echo "Updating repository..."
    git pull origin master
    echo " "
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor $1
    fi
else
echo "Updating repository..."
git pull origin master
echo " "
minWindow
python zeronet.py --tor always
fi

#!/bin/bash

sleep 1
minWindow() { xdotool getactivewindow windowminimize
}
cd /path/to/zeronet

if [ $1 ]; then
    if [ $1 == "disable" ]; then
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor $1
    elif [ $1 == "no-git" ]; then
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor always
    else
    echo "Updating repository..."
    git pull origin master
    echo " "
    minWindow
    python zeronet.py --tor $1
    fi
else
echo "Updating repository..."
git pull origin master
echo " "
minWindow
python zeronet.py --tor always
fi

#!/bin/bash

for i in 1*; do
    echo ""
    grep --color=auto "description" $i/content.json
    grep --color=auto "title" $i/content.json
    try="True"
    while [ "$try" = "True" ]; do
        echo ""
        read -p "Delete? (yes/no) " rd_cln
        if [ -z "$rd_cln" ]; then
            rd_cln="no"
        fi
        if [ "$rd_cln" = "yes" ] || [ "$rd_cln" = "y" ]; then
            echo "Deleted"
            rm -rf $i
            try="False"
        elif [ "$rd_cln" = "no" ] || [ "$rd_cln" = "n" ]; then
            try="False"
        elif [ "$rd_cln" = "ls" ]; then
            ls -lAh $i
            try="True"            
        fi
    done
done
